title: Video Editor (Full Time, Remote)
job_overview:
We're looking for a skilled, creative, and experienced editor to join our e-commerce brand!

This is a freelance position, but we're searching for dedicated professionals who want a long-term, ongoing opportunity. If you're the right fit, this role has the potential to become full-time and fully remote.

How to apply:

Fill out this form: Upgrade to see actual info

Only candidates who complete the application form will be considered.

Once you've submitted your application, send us a reply with the subject:
"FORM COMPLETE"

We appreciate your interest and look forward to reviewing your application!
